FROM( SELECT TLM_KEYNO , @rownum:=@rownum+1 as COUNT , LEFT(TLM_REGDT,10) TLM_REGDT , IFNULL(U.UI_REP_NAME, TLM_REGNM) TLM_UI_NAME , M.TCGM_TITLE TLM_TCGM_TITLE , TLM_COMMENT , TLM_URL , TLM_USE_YN FROM T_LIST_MANAGER B LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON B.TLM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_CATEGORY_MANAGER M ON B.TLM_TCGM_KEYNO = M.TCGM_KEYNO ,(SELECT @rownum:=0)TMP WHERE TLM_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TLM_USE_YN = #{SHOW_USING_YN}
)AA WHERE 1=1
AND COUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND TLM_TCGM_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND TLM_COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND TLM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND TLM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( COUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR TLM_TCGM_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR TLM_COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR TLM_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR TLM_REGDT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') )

SELECT TLM_KEYNO , CONCAT('TLM', CAST(RIGHT(TLM_KEYNO,10) AS UNSIGNED )) KEYNO , LEFT(TLM_REGDT,10) TLM_REGDT , IFNULL(U.UI_REP_NAME, TLM_REGNM) TLM_UI_NAME , M.TCGM_TITLE TLM_TCGM_TITLE , TLM_ALT , TLM_COMMENT , TLM_URL , TLM_FS_KEYNO , TLM_REGNM , TLM_REGDT , TLM_USE_YN , TLM_DEL_YN , TLM_TCGM_KEYNO , M.TCGM_IMG_WIDTH TCGM_IMG_WIDTH , M.TCGM_IMG_HEIGHT TCGM_IMG_HEIGHT , M.TCGM_IMG_YN TCGM_IMG_YN , M.TCGM_IMG_RESIZE_YN TCGM_IMG_RESIZE_YN ,S.FS_ORINM FROM T_LIST_MANAGER B LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON B.TLM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_CATEGORY_MANAGER M ON B.TLM_TCGM_KEYNO = M.TCGM_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_FILE_SUB S ON B.TLM_FS_KEYNO = S.FS_KEYNO WHERE TLM_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TLM_KEYNO = #{TLM_KEYNO}
